mapper.insert: insert into ssmbuild.bookborrow(bookId,bookName, readerId, borrowDate, returnDate, sta) values (#{bookId},#{bookName},#{readerId},#{borrowDate},#{returnDate},#{sta})
mapper.update: update ssmbuild.bookborrow set sta=#{sta} where bookBorrowId=#{bookBorrowId}
mapper.select: select * from ssmbuild.bookborrow order by sta desc
select * from ssmbuild.bookborrow where readerId = #{readerId} and sta != #{nosta} order by sta desc
select * from ssmbuild.bookborrow where bookId = #{bookId} and readerId = #{readerId} and sta = #{sta}
select returnDate from ssmbuild.bookborrow where bookBorrowId = #{bookBorrowId};
select borrowDate from ssmbuild.bookborrow where bookBorrowId = #{bookBorrowId};
select * from ssmbuild.bookborrow where readerId = #{readerId} and sta = #{sta}
